quote: Hiding from the camera is hiding from clients. You are not selling a home; you're selling yourself.
why_clipworthy: This statement challenges agents to rethink their approach to video marketing.
suggested_hook: Are you hiding from the camera and missing out on clients?

quote: You don't need listings to make content. Listings are actually the most boring type of content.
why_clipworthy: This challenges the common belief that listings are the most important content.
suggested_hook: Think listings are the key to great content? Think again.
